title: How to make Yorkshire puddings
description: Use goose fat, beef dripping or lard to get perfect restaurant-style fluffy Yorkies with this easy recipe. If you’re vegetarian you can use any flavourless oil instead (such as sunflower or rapeseed oil).
ingredients: sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 tbsp goose fat, beef dripping or lard (if you are vegetarian, you can use rapeseed oil, sunflower oil or vegetable oil)
